name: (After A) PARTY SIMULATOR 2018
description:
The party's over. It was great - games, beer, food... SO MUCH food.

TOO MUCH food.

And now most everyone's gone and left you to deal with the damn leftovers! It's up to you to figure out who to send home with what so you don't end up with more food than you could fit in an industrial grade fridge.

Made for Ludum Dare 42: 'Running Out of Space'. The game uses some rude language if you're not into that! (Or if you ARE into that, I guess).

Note: There's some minor annoyances in the jam build! I'm leaving the jam build as the html playable version for now to keep ratings fair, but if you like the game and can't quite figure out the second puzzle, feel free to download the post-jam build below! It features highlighting for incorrect items and saving the position of stuff when you change screens, so it should make your puzzle-solving-life a little easier.
